articles.title: Review and setlist: Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit bring a well-rounded Americana showcase to Boston
articles.description:
The Alabama songwriter and his trusty band pulled off a tasteful mix of tracks new and old at the Boch Center Wang Theatre.

The post Review and setlist: Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit bring a well-rounded Americana showcase to Boston appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jason Isbell and the 400 Unit performed at Boch Center Wang Theatre on February 28.
The concert featured a mix of new and classic Americana tracks for local fans.
Boston residents enjoyed a high-quality musical experience from a renowned Alabama songwriter.

articles.title: Latest reports suggest Patriots are unlikely to land big-name edge rusher before NFL Draft
articles.description:
Some of the top edge rushers that could move this offseason include Maxx Crosby and Trey Hendrickson.

The post Latest reports suggest Patriots are unlikely to land big-name edge rusher before NFL Draft appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots unlikely to acquire top edge rusher before NFL Draft in April.
Maxx Crosby and Trey Hendrickson among potential targets not expected to join.
Boston fans may see continued defensive struggles without major roster improvements.
